text:
@marcorubio Your ludicrous, risible, science-phobic President literally just stood up and made COVID-19 in the US all about him and how amazing he is. 

China has it handled. I’d worry about your own backyard if I were you, and the millions of idiots in it as dumb as your “leader”.

domain.name: Person

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
